title: All the Backlist! March 25, 2022
description:
This week, Liberty talks about a few backlist titles she unearthed from her library.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book. And don’t forget to check out our new podcast Adaptation Nation! Subscribe on your podcatcher of choice.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
BOOKS DISCUSSED ON THE SHOW:
Every Day Is for the Thief by Teju Cole
The Hundred-Year House by Rebecca Makkai
An Elegy for Easterly: Stories by Petina Gappah
Little Lives by John Howland Spyker
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
